title: 01. Basic Information
name: Info
description:
Each API call will return the result in JSON format. There are 2 objects, "status" and "data".

The "status" object returns "ok" when the transaction is successful and "error" on failure.

The "data" object returns the requested data, as sub-objects.

The parameters must be sent either as POST['data'], json encoded array or independently as GET.

Success 200.description: The data provided by the api will be under this object.

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: 03. base58
name: base58
description: Converts a string to base58.

title: 22. checkAddress
name: checkAddress
description: Checks the validity of an address.

Success 200.description: True if the address is valid, false otherwise.

title: 17. checkSignature
name: checkSignature
description: Checks a signature against a public key

title: 10. currentBlock
name: currentBlock
description: Returns the current block.

title: 09. generateAccount
name: generateAccount
description: Generates a new account. This function should only be used when the node is on the same host or over a really secure network.

title: 02. getAddress
name: getAddress
description: Converts the public key to an ARO address.

title: 19. getAlias
name: getAlias
description: Returns the alias of an account

title: 04. getBalance
name: getBalance
description: Returns the balance of a specific account or public key.

title: 11. getBlock
name: getBlock
description: Returns the block.

title: 12. getBlockTransactions
name: getBlockTransactions
description: Returns the transactions of a specific block.

title: 05. getPendingBalance
name: getPendingBalance
description: Returns the pending balance, which includes pending transactions, of a specific account or public key.

title: 08. getPublicKey
name: getPublicKey
description: Returns the public key of a specific account.

title: 07. getTransaction
name: getTransaction
description: Returns one transaction.

title: 06. getTransactions
name: getTransactions
description: Returns the latest transactions of an account.

title: 18. masternodes
name: masternodes
description: Returns all the masternode data

title: 15. mempoolSize
name: mempoolSize
description: Returns the number of transactions in mempool.

title: 21. node-info
name: node_info
description: Returns details about the node.

Success 200.description: A collection of data about the node.
The database schema version for the node.
The number of accounts known by the node.
The number of transactions known by the node.
The number of transactions in the mempool.
The number of masternodes known by the node.

title: 16. randomNumber
name: randomNumber
description: Returns a random number based on an ARO block id.

Parameter.description: The height of the block on which the random number will be based on (should be a future block when starting)
A seed to generate different numbers for each use cases.

title: 20. sanity
name: sanity
description: Returns details about the node's sanity process.

Success 200.description: A collection of data about the sanity process.
Whether the sanity process is currently running.
The timestamp for the last time the sanity process was run.
Whether the sanity process is currently synchronising.

title: 14. send
name: send
description: Sends a transaction.

Parameter.description: Transaction signature. It's recommended that the transaction is signed before being sent to the node to avoid sending your private key to the node.
Sender's private key. Only to be used when the transaction is not signed locally.
Transaction's date in UNIX TIMESTAMP format. Requried when the transaction is pre-signed.
A message to be included with the transaction. Maximum 128 chars.
The version of the transaction. 1 to send coins.

title: 13. version
name: version
description: Returns the node's version.

title: Balance
name: balance
description: Prints the balance of an address or a public key

title: Block
name: block
description: Returns a specific block

title: Block-time
name: block_time
description: Shows the block time of the last 100 blocks

title: Blocks
name: blocks
description: Prints the id and the height of the blocks >=arg2, max 100 or arg3

title: Check-Address
name: check_address
description: Checks a specific address for validity

title: Clean
name: clean
description: Cleans the entire database

title: Clean-Blacklist
name: clean_blacklist
description: Removes all the peers from blacklist

title: Current
name: current
description: Prints the current block in var_dump

title: Delete-peer
name: delete_peer
description: Removes a peer from the peerlist

title: Get-Address
name: get_address
description: Converts a public key into an address

title: Mempool
name: mempool
description: Prints the number of transactions in mempool

title: Peer
name: peer
description: Creates a peering session with another node

title: Peers
name: peers
description: Prints all the peers and their status

title: Peers-Block
name: peers_block
description: Prints the current height of all the peers

title: Pop
name: pop
description: Cleans the entire database

title: Recheck-Blocks
name: recheck_blocks
description: Recheck all the blocks to make sure the blockchain is correct
